nodes.nodeText: Hey again, things are looking pretty bleak here.
Well, we've got more than just ants on our hands this time.
That's right. We're up against hedgehogs, snails and mushroom turrets this time.

options.optionText: Ok, I'm all briefed. Let's do this.

nodes.nodeText: Hedgehogs are nasty little things, they wait until you're nearby and then come after you! They do some nasty damage too.

options.optionText: Ok, how about the other enemies?

nodes.nodeText: Snails, not too hard but annoying. They leave a trail of toxic sludge wherever they move... Don't want to step in that!

options.optionText: Ok, how about the other enemies?

nodes.nodeText: Mushroom turrets, they're the ones that are shooting at you. you'll want to try kill those as soon as you can.

options.optionText: Ok, how about the other enemies?

nodes.nodeText: One more thing. This is a pretty big place, it might not look like it right now though! Just try going to the ends of the roads to see what I mean.
